Date: Jan 09, 2025

Nora Fatehi shared her terrifying experience with Los Angeles wildfires, revealing she received an evacuation order just minutes before she had to leave. Priyanka Chopra also documented the crisis from her home.

  • Nora Fatehi recorded a video from her car showing the raging fires in LA.
  • She expressed her fear and discussed her plans to stay near the airport to catch her flight.
  • Priyanka Chopra posted videos of the wildfires burning near her home and expressed her concern for everyone's safety.
  • The wildfires have destroyed over 1,000 structures and forced over 130,000 residents to evacuate.
  • Notable figures from Hollywood have also been affected, with many forced to flee their homes.
‚ÄúI'm in LA and the wildfires are crazy. I've never seen anything like this... So, I quickly packed all my stuff and I'm evacuating out of here...‚Äù - Nora Fatehi

title: Once bigger than Shah Rukh, Salman Khan, this star lost it all after 20 straight flops, was unable to pay medical bills - Hindustan Times
summary:
The Rise and Fall of Rahul Roy: From Stardom to Struggles

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Once a promising star in Bollywood, Rahul Roy's career fell into decline after a series of failures at the box office, leading him to face significant personal and financial struggles.

  • Debuted in 1990 with the hit film Aashiqui.
  • Achieved stardom but suffered a downfall with 20 consecutive flops.
  • Participated in reality shows and faced financial hardships.
  • Suffered a stroke and heart attack in 2020, requiring extensive medical treatment.
  • Received support from Salman Khan during his health crisis.
  • Made a comeback in 2023 in both acting and producing roles.
‚ÄúI did not even have the money to foot my medical bills.‚Äù - Rahul Roy

Rahul Roy's journey reflects the unpredictable nature of fame in the entertainment industry, illustrating that even the brightest stars can face significant challenges.

After 35 days in theaters, Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2' has amassed an impressive worldwide box office collection of Rs 1,840 crores, which places it just Rs 230 crore short of dethroning Aamir Khan's 'Dangal'.

  • The film has made Rs 2.15 crore on day 35, bringing its total domestic collection to Rs 1213 crore.

summary:
Los Angeles wildfire LIVE Updates: 5 dead, ‚ÄòSunset Fire‚Äô in Hollywood Hills grows to 50 acres, Biden cancels Italy trip

Date: 09 Jan 2025 Source: LiveMint

Firefighters in Los Angeles are grappling with an out-of-control wildfire that has claimed five lives and forced a mass evacuation of 100,000 residents, including numerous celebrities.

  • The fire has destroyed multimillion-dollar homes and affected approximately 100,000 residents in the surrounding areas.
  • California Governor Gavin Newsom expressed gratitude for the efforts of firefighters managing the crisis.
  • President Joe Biden canceled his trip to Italy to focus on addressing the wildfires in California.
  • SpaceX is providing free Starlink terminals to areas affected by the fires, aiding communication for residents.
  • The Eaton Fire has grown to 10,600 acres, causing significant destruction and prompting widespread evacuations.
  • Authorities urged residents to stay indoors due to dangerous air quality caused by the smoke.
‚ÄúThe President‚Äôs action makes Federal funding available to affected individuals in Los Angeles County.‚Äù - White House Statement

This wildfire event highlights the ongoing challenges of wildfire management in California, compounded by extreme weather conditions.

Date: Jan 09, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Global star Priyanka Chopra is extremely happy as she has come on board as an executive producer for the Oscar-shortlisted film Anuja. This film centers on a nine-year-old girl working in a garment factory who faces life-changing decisions.

  • Priyanka Chopra is proud to join the film Anuja as an executive producer.
  • The film is produced in collaboration with Salaam Baalak Trust, Shine Global, and Krushan Naik Films.
  • Guneet Monga, known for her Oscar-winning projects, is also a producer on Anuja.
  • Anuja depicts the struggles of children in tough circumstances, highlighting important social issues.

title: Nagarjuna Akkineni reveals his fitness mantra for a strong physique at 65: 'I finish my dinner by 7 pm or - TOI Etimes
summary:
Nagarjuna Akkineni Shares Fitness Tips for a Strong Physique at 65

Publication Date: Not specifiedSource: HT Lifestyle

Nagarjuna Akkineni is set to celebrate his 66th birthday this year and has shared his fitness secrets that help him maintain a strong physique.

  • Nagarjuna works out 5 to 6 days a week for about an hour each morning.
  • He incorporates swimming and golf into his routine for mental and physical well-being.
  • The actor practises a mix of cardio and strength training, believing in consistency for over 30 years.
  • He emphasizes the importance of maintaining a heart rate above 70% during workouts.
  • Nagarjuna finishes his dinner by 7 pm or 7:30 pm, adapting his diet as he ages.
  • He follows a 12:12 intermittent fasting routine and enjoys cheat meals on Sundays.
  • Golf and swimming contribute significantly to his mental clarity and overall fitness.
‚ÄúI finish my dinner by 7 pm or 7:30 pm at the latest. This habit sets your diet and lifestyle on the right track.‚Äù

Nagarjuna's commitment to fitness at 65 serves as an inspiration, highlighting the balance between physical activity and a healthy diet for overall well-being.
newTitle: Nagarjuna Akkineni Shares Fitness Tips for a Strong Physique at 65

Kangana Ranaut shares her thoughts on the delays and challenges surrounding her directorial debut, Emergency, revealing her regrets over certain decisions.

Farah Khan's experiences underscore the importance of perseverance and a positive outlook, despite challenging beginnings.

  • She debuted as a director with the acclaimed short film Kelkkunnundo.
  • Her feature film Liar‚Äôs Dice was India‚Äôs official entry to the Oscars.
  • Her latest film, Toxic, stars Yash and is set for release later this year.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

‚ÄúGeetu ventured into direction with her short fiction film Kelkkunnundo... It became so influential that it was included as part of the Kerala state syllabus for 12th-grade students in 2014.‚Äù

Geetu Mohandas‚Äôs journey from child star to acclaimed filmmaker illustrates her evolution and significant contributions to Indian cinema.
